title: OT9: The Thread Pirate Roberts
summary:
Key ideas
- A Washington Post article discusses a French mathematician's attempt to explain fashion using cellular automata.
- The author's previous attempt to explain fashion using cellular automata also referenced hipsters.
- The author shares comments of the month, including a discussion on the genetics of divorce and a unique NaNoWriMo novel idea.

Key learnings
- Fashion and cellular automata have been the subject of study by both the author and a French mathematician. 
- The comments section of the author's previous post produced interesting and diverse discussions on various topics.

Key questions
- None mentioned.
